div.p:
Mental Health Resources Available during the Coronavirus Pandemic
Virtual Counseling Available to Creighton Community Public School students:
Grades 7-12: contact School Counselor, Christine Baldwin, chrisbaldwin@chsbulldogs.org
Grades K-6: contact School Counselor, Teresa Kuhl, teresakuhl@chsbulldogs.org
Nebraska Family Hotline (1-888-866-8660): Any Problem. Any Time. A free resource for . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about Coronavirus and Mental Health Resources

h3.a: CCPS To Offer Free Breakfast/Lunch Starting Friday

div.p: Creighton Community School will be offering free lunch/breakfast starting Friday to all children ages 2-18 that live in the district or attend Creighton Community School. Lunches are to be picked up with breakfast for the following day. If you wish to participate, please complete the attached link by Thursday at noon. Lunches will be picked up at the kitchen entrance on the east side of the school from 11:30 a.m. until 12:30 p.m. . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about CCPS To Offer Free Breakfast/Lunch Starting Friday

div.em: Current conditions as of 26 Apr 16:35 pm CDT

td.span: Partly cloudy, with a low around 47. South wind 8 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.
Sunny, with a high near 78. Light and variable wind becoming north northeast 5 to 10 mph in the morning.

A chance of showers and thunderstorms, then showers likely and possibly a thunderstorm after 3am. Increasing clouds, with a low around 56. East wind 5 to 11 mph becoming south southwest after midnight. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts of less than a tenth of an inch, except higher amounts possible in thunderstorms.
